actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code so as to permit members of the Reserves and the National Guard to receive retired pay at age 55 for nonregular service under chapter 67 of that title.

summary.text: Permits members of the reserve components of the armed forces and members of the National Guard to receive retired pay at age 55 for non-regular service. (Amends 10 USC 1331)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code so as to permit members of the Reserves and the National Guard to receive retired pay at age 55 for nonregular service under chapter 67 of that title.
